properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:06PM AKST until January 15 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility will be
reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow
accumulations of up to one inch are expected. Travel will be
difficult.

* WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast.

* WHEN...6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas
of blowing and drifting snow. The worst conditions are
expected Tuesday afternoon and evening.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY
